title: Constellation
description: A constellation ability triggers every time an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control.

title: Escape
description: You may cast an escape card from your graveyard. The Escape cost is specified near the keyword by an amount of mana and a number of other cards you must exile from your graveyard.

title: Devotion
description: Devotion to a color is equal to the number of mana symbols of the specified color in the mana costs of permanents you control.

title: Sagas
description: As a sage enters the battlefield, its controller puts a lore count on it. Immediately after your draw step, ypu put another lore counter on each Saga you control. For each chapter an ability triggers. Once a lore counter is greater than or equal to the number of chapters, the controllers owner sacrifices the sage.
